title: FPS DROP IN 7.24
body:
I have a gtx 1060 3gb and now when ever i enter a game its fine untill i press an abillty then the fps goes from 60 to 7-12
does anyone have this issue too ?

replies.body: This could be caused by a lot of different factors, so we definitely want to help rule out some possibilities.  A force repatch with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) or repair can help in case your game files are struggling to render your assets.  Test it in a custom game!  If it persists, run through our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your settings and let me know if it helps.
